summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6251 for the improvement of 28th Ave. Northeast from Northwest 85th Street to Northwest 95th Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 90308, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
